description:
SF-23-006 FAST (FAST AUTONOMOUS SCANNING TOOLKIT)The software is deployed on an edge computing device at the beamline computer attached to a 
scanning microscope. It iteratively analyzes the data collected, then identifies new scan positions 
to scan next and directs the positioners that move the sample (or probe beam) to these positions. 
Overall, it identifies a sparse set of scan positions that are sufficient to image the full sample. 
This can reduce the scan time by >60%.
name: FAST (FAST AUTONOMOUS SCANNING TOOLKIT)
